contentrichtext.text: {{Use mdy dates|date=February 2011}} The '''[[United States Senate]] Committee on Veterans' Affairs''' deals with oversight of [[United States]] [[veterans]] issues. ==Members, 113th Congress== The Committee is chaired by [[Independent (politician)|Independent]] [[Bernie Sanders]] of [[Vermont]], and the [[Ranking Member]] is [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican]] [[Richard Burr]] of [[North Carolina]]. {| class=wikitable ! Majority !
